mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule( schedule_date, schedule_title, schedule_content, schedule_place, schedule_title_color ) VALUE( #{scheduleDate}, #{scheduleTitle}, #{scheduleContent}, #{schedulePlace}, #{scheduleTitleColor} )
mapper.select: SELECT schedule_no as scheduleNo, schedule_title as scheduleTitle, schedule_content as scheduleContent, schedule_place as schedulePlace FROM schedule WHERE schedule_date = #{scheduleDate} ORDER BY schedule_no DESC
SELECT schedule_title as scheduleTitle, schedule_title_color as scheduleTitleColor FROM schedule WHERE schedule_date = #{scheduleDate} ORDER BY schedule_no DESC
